description: Kuki ari ngombwa kuganira no kungurana ibitekerezo ku ndwara ya malariya ?
title: Kuki ari ngombwa kuganira no kungurana ibitekerezo ku ndwara ya malariya ?
content:
Malariya ni indwara iterwa n’agakoko kitwa Plasimodiyumu gakwirakwizwa
n’umubu w’ingore wa Anoferi iyo ukurumye kandi warumye n’uyirwaye. 
Ibimenyetso by’ingenzi bya Malariya ni uguhinda umuriro, kubabara 
umutwe,kugira iseseme no kuruka. Iyo Malariya itavuwe neza kandi hakiri kare 
ishobora kuvamo Malariya y’igikatu, ku buryo umurwayi agwa muri koma, akaba 
yanapfa. Abana bari munsi y’imyaka itanu n’abagore batwite ni bo bakunze 
kuyirwara kuko ubudahangarwa bw’umubiri wabo buba ari buke mu kuyirwanya.
Iyi ndwara yiganje cyane mu bihugu by’Afurika yo munsi y’ubutayu bwa Sahara ari 
naho u Rwanda ruri.


Ku mubyeyi utwite, Malariya ishobora gutuma akuramo inda, abyara umwana 
udashyitse, ute ibiro bike cyangwa agakubita igihwereye. Ishobora kandi 
kumutera kubura amaraso bigatuma ashobora gupfa abyara. 
Nyamara ubuzima bw’abantu benshi bushobora kurokoka hafashwe ingamba zo 
kuyirinda no kuyivuza neza hakiri kare. Mu Rwanda ho hafashwe ingamba zo 
kuyirandura burundu.
